data.oai_dc:dc: Seed set of manipulated flowers (Excel sheet one) and microsatellite data (Excel sheet two). Pop = population, ind = individual, rank = flower position, treat = treatment, seednb = seed set. Treatments are: (a) open-pollination of intact flowers, (b) emasculation of anthers prior to anthesis, (c) apical stigma removed before receptivity, (d) emasculation and apical stigma removed, (e) pollen supplementation using outcross pollen applied to apical stigmas.
